short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Complete Chrome companion: Session, tab & extension management, bookmarks backup, citations, page saving, DOI search & system tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Complete Chrome Companion
There is zero user tracking and all session and tab information is saved in your bookmarks
Transform your browsing experience with comprehensive tools for:

Tab & Session Management
Save and restore complete browsing sessions
Create and manage tab groups
Generate tab lists
Rename tabs for better organization
Quick tab management tools

Research & Citations
Generate citations for any webpage
Search for DOI references
Look up ORCID identifiers
Translate pages instantly
Customize reading with font size adjustments and dark mode

Page Capture & Saving
Save pages as PDF files
Capture full-page screenshots
Quick access to Google Docs
Backup functionality for bookmarks
Full bookmark backup
Individual folder backup

Browser Management
Toggle between extension groups
Clear browsing data easily:
History
Cookies
Cache

Monitor system resources:
Track bookmark counts
View active extensions
Check available memory
Display Chrome and Windows versions
